data.text: @AdamCF @VaxHuntersCan First 2 days this week scrambling to find an appointment, told "no appointments available in Toronto". Turn on @VaxHuntersCan, find a spot 5 mins away from my place giving jabs asap. From no appointment to half vaxxed in no time.
@AdamCF @VaxHuntersCan I just signed up for a pharmacy's wait list and got an appointment in a couple of days. No sweat
